item.title: Mastering PostgreSQL in Application Development
item.description: I am writing a book to share my knowledge about how to best use PostgreSQL as an application developer. If you’ve ever asked yourself how much should I have my database do for me? this book is for you. If you’re thinking that using an ORM might not always be the best option out there, if sometimes you wish SQL was easier to maintain than those concatenated strings with conditionals, then this book can’t wait for you!
